short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save the Web to Notion. Use AI to create summaries and auto-prefills. Easily create how-to guides with screenshots in Notion.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Finally, a reliable Notion web clipper with all the features you need:

üöÄ Templates for Efficiency: Quickly populate properties with pre-defined values or pull info from the current website, like page titles or URLs.

üì∑ Screenshots Made Simple: Notix lets you effortlessly add screenshots from your current page. You have the flexibility to choose between capturing the visible area or the entire page. You can also copy and paste images from your favorite screenshot tool or from your files.

üìù Effortless Page Editing: Edit page content effortlessly using Notix's extension. It's as intuitive as editing a Notion page, directly from your browser.

üß± Custom Blocks for Content Prefill: Craft custom blocks in Notix to populate page content effortlessly. It's a one-stop solution ‚Äì automatically capture a screenshot, insert selected text, include page title or URL, and even employ AI for content summarization. Your content, your way.

ü§ñ AI-Powered Prefill: Prefill properties, generate page titles, summarize web pages and much more with the power of AI.
